text:
使用VPS部署MoltBot（ClawdBot）请保护好18789端口，尤其是依赖大厂默认预设模板的萌新……

目前有人正在大规模爆破，从Censys、Fofa可见这些VPS的18789端口处于开放状态。
若保持默认凭证不做配置，可能会有入侵风险，请认真阅读官方文档配置好了再开始使用！
How do people protect their ClawdBot against prompt injection? A lot of people save sensitive stuff in their email and Google drive.
Hice exactamente eso mismo con clawdbot y lo estoy amando. Los pone a Claude y códex a discutir entre ellos.

People love 
@moltbot
 a.k.a Clawdbot because it’s smart, stores memory locally, and handles daily tasks right on your device.    

At Questflow, we built this vision from day 1. But went further. Text, image, video, files, audio, news, forecasts, crypto, trading, tools, utilities.

@agentmail
 使ってみてください！Clawdbotとも相性抜群！
